name: Victory Hand
baseMeaning: A hand showing the V sign with index and middle fingers raised.
tldr: Peace, victory, or casual coolness. The classic photo pose.

platformNotes.note: Classic photo pose emoji, extremely common.
Used as casual farewell or cool sign-off.

generationalNotes.note: Common photo pose and casual farewell.
Associated with 60s/70s peace movement or victory.

seoTitle: ✌️ Victory Hand Emoji Meaning - What Does ✌️ Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the victory hand emoji ✌️ really means in texting. Peace, victory, or cool vibes. Complete context guide.
